data.short_description: Client crashes when @mentioning users with formatted names.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new account and set the name to 𝓣𝓮𝓼𝓽. - Join a Discord you own on this new account. - Give your new account a nickname within the Discord. - Use your new account on your PC/phone and get on your main account on an iPad/iPhone. - Spam some random letters on the new account. - Type @<their whole name except the last letter>- Tap their name that appears in the auto suggest
